title: Decision Option Calendar Constraints
description: Calendar constraints decide if a decision option is valid given a date range. Outside that date range the option cannot be proposed.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Calendar Constraint Details
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Calendar constraints decide if a decision option is valid given a date range. Outside that date range the option cannot be proposed.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Start Date & Time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: The start date of a decision options validity.. Options that have not reached their start date cannot be proposed yet in the decisioning process.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: End Date & Time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: The end date of a decision options validity. Options that have passed their end date can no longer cannot be proposed in the decisioning process.
